title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
lowing Guts to rummage through your memories will give you the following dialogue options.

I was abducted... A mind flayer infected me with this thing. You're out of luck. I don't know any more about it than you do. I'll make you pay for this, goblin.

After choosing dialogue 1, Guts will explain that shes aware of what happens and will give you the following dialogue options.

Then stop this! Heal me. No, I'm not going to let that happen. You're infected. The same thing will happen to you. You
